text: Los senadores Rubio y Menendez presentaron un proyecto de ley q busca fortalecer la rendición de cuentas por la explotación del régimen cubano al personal de salud y restablece el Programa de Libertad Condicional para los Médicos Profesionales, suspendida por el pres. Obama.

Sen.Rubio joined Sen.Menendez in introducing a bill that seeks to strengthen accountability for the Cuban regime’s documented exploitation of Cuban medical professionals & re-establishes the Cuban Medical Professional Parole Program,suspended by Pres.Obama

Important historical context:
Every time there has been a vacancy on #SCOTUS in a presidential election year, the president has made a nomination.
Of the 19 times, the president and the Senate majority were of the same party, the Senate confirmed the nominee 17 times. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1307683384290881536/img/FBIVL4OeNDrUynsS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1307683384290881536/vid/480x270/YBJgJC__K8KZYlO-.mp4?tag=13

We’re still in the throes of a global pandemic with no end in sight. We still don’t know the long term health impacts of COVID-19. We simply can't afford to let Donald Trump and Republicans ram through a Supreme Court justice who will gut health care for millions of Americans.

Our very democracy is on the line—and we have no time to waste.
